en.about_text: We offer professional topographic and geodetic services. Our expert team uses the latest technologies to perform land surveys, mapping, and analysis with high accuracy. Below, you can find more details about our services.
en.about_paragraph: We provide accurate surveying and mapping services for various industries, including construction, land development, and urban planning.
en.service_1_text:
Topographic surveys are used to determine the relief of an area and the position of objects. Our services include: ‚Ä¢ Accurate measurement of land and building coordinates 
 ‚Ä¢ Preparation of topographic maps for engineering and architectural projects 
‚Ä¢ Determining land and property boundaries 
‚Ä¢ Land measurement for construction projects 
The tools we use include total stations, GPS devices, drones, and laser scanners.
en.service_2_text:
Cadastral works are essential for the legal registration and documentation of land plots. We provide accurate land measurements and prepare the necessary documents. Our services include: 
‚Ä¢ Determining property boundaries 
‚Ä¢ Preparing cadastral plans and maps 
‚Ä¢ Executing land subdivision and consolidation projects 
‚Ä¢ Property passport preparation
en.service_3_text:
We provide high-precision GPS measurements and geodetic services for mapping and analysis. Our services include: 
‚Ä¢ RTK and static GPS measurements 
‚Ä¢ Establishing coordinate systems for infrastructure and transportation projects 
‚Ä¢ Geodetic services for various industries 
‚Ä¢ Precision height and slope measurements
en.service_4_text:
We use drones and laser scanners for 3D mapping of areas and the creation of digital models. Our services include: 
‚Ä¢ Aerial photography with drones and 3D mapping 
‚Ä¢ Preparation of topographic and digital elevation models 
‚Ä¢ Volume and terrain analysis for construction and mining projects 
‚Ä¢ Urban planning and landscape modeling
en.service_5_text:
We provide precise topographic and geodetic data analysis and design for engineering and urban planning projects. Our services include: 
‚Ä¢ Preliminary topographic research for construction projects 
‚Ä¢ Geotechnical and geodetic analysis of land 
‚Ä¢ Relief compatibility analysis for projects 
‚Ä¢ BIM and GIS integration for design projects
en.team_paragraph: Our team consists of experienced professionals who are dedicated to delivering high-quality surveying and geospatial solutions.

en.contact_subtitle: Fill out the form below, and we will respond as soon as possible
en.faq_question_1: How long does the measurement process take?
en.faq_answer_1: It depends on the size and complexity of the area. Small areas may take a few hours, while larger projects could take several days.
en.faq_answer_2: Prices depend on the size, complexity, and the required services. Please contact us for detailed information.
en.faq_question_3: What areas do you operate in?
en.faq_answer_3: We currently provide services in Azerbaijan, including Baku and surrounding regions.
en.faq_question_4: What is the accuracy of the measurements?
en.faq_answer_4: Depending on the technology used, the accuracy can reach millimeter level.
en.faq_question_5: In which areas do you provide services?
en.faq_answer_5: Currently, we mainly offer topographic and geodesic services within Azerbaijan.
en.faq_question_6: Do I need permission or documents for topographic measurements?
en.faq_answer_6: In some cases, official permission and relevant documents may be required for measurements. We also provide legal advice on this matter.
en.faq_question_7: How can I place an order for services?
en.faq_answer_7: Contact us with information about your project, and our team will offer suitable solutions for you.
